name: @fairmanager/gitlab-build-image
description: FairManager Test Runner for GitLab CI

scripts.docker:build: bash -c "docker build --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\"` --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --tag fairmanager/gitlab-build-image:latest ."
scripts.docker:tag: bash -c "docker tag fairmanager/gitlab-build-image:latest fairmanager/gitlab-build-image:$npm_package_version && docker tag fairmanager/gitlab-build-image:latest fairmanager/gitlab-build-image:latest"
